The person's head is starting to face sideways to the left side. with their arm still waving back and forth, gesturing to come closer.

The person's arm is continuing to go upward, with their palm still open. Their face is still toward me, and their left arm is in a downward motion.
The person is basically still, but their body is slightly tilting to the left side.
The person's left arm is slightly coming downward and their body is very slightly starting to lean forward. Their palm is open, which might indicate a stopping gesture.
The person's arm is going downward, with their body movement indicating that stopping is not necessary anymore. Does not look like the human is making any gestures anymore.
The person has both of their opens starting to move in an upward trajection. Their face is toward me, and their arms are going rather quick upward.
The person's arm movements are indicating a 'follow me' action, with their palms constantly opening and closing in the direction of their body.
The person's palms are initially closed but then open back up toward me, still signaling a gesturing to come forward.
The person's arms are still going in the back and forth motion, their body movement is starting to change a little but their face is still facing me.
The person's hand gesturing are moving slower now, at the end it seems that the gesture might be stopping
The person's left arm is going in a downward motion but their right arm is still staying upward, with their palm directed toward the left side of their body.
The persons's right arm starts to go toward their chest, and then slowly back out toward me. their palm starts facing the person's chest.
The person's right arm starts to move downward, the person's face is still facing me.
The person's body starts moving to the left side, while their right arm is still going downward. It seems that the gesture toward me has stopped.
The person is starting to walk in a direction that is not facing me. Both of the arms of the person are downward, and not indicating any type of gesture.

The subjects arms are moving from their sides to the front of their body, with their palms facing each other in such a manner that both of the arms point towards the driver. The subject's body is oriented towards the driver.
The subject raises both arms in front of their shoulders, with their palms facing each other, and then begin to move their right arm downwards.
The subject begins to swing their arm, in such a manner that it points towards the diver's left side, with their other hand still pointing towards the driver.
The subject shakes his right arm, up and down while pointing it towards the driver's left side, the subject also moves his head, such that it faces the driver.
The subject moves his right arm towards his body, while his other arm is still pointing to the driver with the palm facing towards the driver's left side.

The person moves his right arm away from his body such that it points towards the driver's left side.The palm of his right arm faces the driver when the arm reaches the maximum height, while his other arm is still pointing towards the driver.
The person moves his right arm towards his body, and turns his head towards the driver's left side. His other arm is still pointing towards the driver, with his palm facing the driver's left side.

The person moves his right arm away from his body such that it points towards his right side, and the driver's left side. His other arm is pointing towards the driver, with its palm facing the driver's left side. The subject also seems to be turning his head towards the driver.

The person moves his right arm slightly up and away from his body and then keeps it that position with his palm facing the driver. His other arm is pointing towards the driver, with its palm facing the driver's left side. The subject also seems to be turning his head towards the driver.
The subject seems to be now lowering both of his arms while his head is facing the the driver
The person in the set of images seems to be bringing both of his arms together in front of his body, with his palms facing each other. The subject's body is oriented towards the driver.

The guy in the frame raises both his arms slightly, and then begins to swing his right arm towards the driver's left side. His other arm is still pointing towards the driver, with his palm facing the driver's left side.
The subject moves his right arm away from his body such that it points towards the driver's left side. His other arm is still pointing towards the driver with the palm facing his right side.
The person moves his right arms slightly up, his palms are facing the driver. His other arm is pointing towards the driver with the palm facing the driver's left side.
The subject moves his right arm towards his body while his other arm is still pointing towards the driver with the palm facing the driver's left side.

The person moves his right arm up slightly more, his other arm is still pointing towards the driver with the palm facing the driver's left side.

Person is standing upright with a relaxed posture beginning the motion of raising their hands
A person is raising their hands up so that their palms are facing the camera
The person pushes their hands that are facing the camera outwards and brings them back in almost as if their signaling to stop or slow down
The person moves their hands outwards and then pulls them back facing the camera but close to their body
The person fully extends their arms and hands outwards and immediately begins to pull them back into their body

While the person has their left hand up and palm facing the camera signaling to stop, they begin to motion their right hand up
A person has their left hand with their palm up facing the camera, while their right hand motions to point to the right
While signaling to stop with their left hand, the person motions his right hand towards him as if he's calling someone over
While signaling to stop with their left hand, the person motions his right hand accross his body and points to right direction
With the person's left hand up and palm facing the camera the person they begin to motion their right arm back from the left to the right across their body
The person extends their right hand out to their right side while holding up their left hand with their palm facing the camera

The person's body is facing to the left, and they are raising their left arm to me while turning their head to face me. It seems like they are telling me to stop, while still maintaining attention to what is happening to my left or in front of their body in the direction they are facing. The body is facing left, but the head is facing me.
The person is mostly facing me, but leaving some of their body posture to something on my left (their right). Their left hand is raised to me with an open palm, telling me to stop.
The person is mostly facing me, but leaving some of their body posture to something on my left (their right). Their left hand is raised to me with an open palm, telling me to stop.

The person still has their left hand with open palm towards me, telling me to stop. Their right arm is beginning to raise, from their side towards the horizontal. Their gaze attention is shifting to the object to my left (their right). They seem that they are about to give an instruction to this cross-traffic agent.

The person's gaze is fully placed on the agent to my left (the person's right). Their left hand is raised to me to tell me to stop. Their right arm is fully directed to the agent to my left. They have raised a finger of their right arm, which appears to request the attention or action of this cross-traffic agent.

The person's left hand is still held with an open palm to tell me to stop. Their finger of their right hand is making an arc motion, which seems to suggest to the cross-traffic agent that they can begin making motion.

The right arm of the person is making a horizontal sweeping motion, as if indicating to the cross-traffic agent that they should move to their left (the instructing person's right). The left hand is still held with an open palm to tell me to stop.

The right arm of the person ends its sweeping arc, and instead of maintaining all fingers loosely outstretched, ends with just one finger sharply pointing at the end of the arc, indicating the direction of motion the cross-traffic agent should take. The left hand is still held with an open palm to tell me to stop.

The sweeping arc motion of the right hand is continued by the traffic director. This indicates that the cross-traffic agent should continue their motion accordingly, following the direction of the arc when the arm is outstretched, but not in the direction of the recovery of the arc when the finger is not pointed. The left hand is still held with an open palm to tell me to stop.

The traffic director continues the outward sweep of the right arm. The gaze also turns with the sweep, towards the directional destination of the cross-traffic agent. The left hand is still held with an open palm to tell me to stop.

The traffic director recovers the sweep made by the right arm, to reset with his arm in front of him. During this motion, the wrist is left more limp and the fingers are not held in a tight point, allowing less focus to be placed on the hand by the cross-traffic agent. The left hand maintains its stop position, with an open palm directed toward me.

The traffic director leaves his right arm at the end of its arc, pointing in the direction the cross-traffic agent should travel. While keeping the left arm in a stop position outstretched towards me, the traffic director turns his gaze to me (turning to his left), making eye contact with me in anticipation of the next instruction.
